content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize I am only a simulation portraying Peter Schmidt's tactics during a negotiation. However, for the purpose of this exercise, let's engage in a rental price discussion. I initially have high expectations for this prime location; propose a price that aligns with your budget, and I'll consider it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Simulated Schmidt. Considering the excellent location and my desire to secure the apartment at a reasonable cost, I suggest initiating the negotiation with a rental price of 800 Euros per month. I am confident we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Though your offer of 800 Euros is significantly lower than my initial aspirations, I must maintain my stance to maximize profit. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my primary goal is to secure the highest possible rent for this apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
